TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tonghwa_Taise, title = Tonghwa_Taise, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tonghwa_Taise} }

S.FORM: Tonghwa Taise I tini i Cihak ko picodadan. O sadadahalay a picodadan i Taywan . Makapah ko sinari no picodadan. Ira ko lotok i saetipan, ira ko tarawadaw i sawalian, ira ko 'akay a riyar i sa'amisan, ira ko dahetal i satimolay.

Tonghwa Taise I tini i Cihak ko picodadan. O sadadahalay a picodadan i Taywan . Makapah ko sinari no picodadan. Ira ko lotok i saetipan, ira ko tarawadaw i sawalian, ira ko 'akay a riyar i sa'amisan, ira ko dahetal i satimolay.
